episode_event_champion_galar_battle/4001:
The arena is absolutely packed, and everyone’s
all fired up!
Hehe... Welcome, challenger!

Sorry, but I’m afraid I won’t be cheerin’ for
you today.

’Cause we’re the ones who are gonna
seize victory!

No matter how much one trains, there will always
be a winner and a loser... The world of battling is
cruel indeed.

As Neo Champions, it’s our duty to teach
you that lesson.

And on that note! I’ll be your first
opponent, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Now, now... Just a moment. Perhaps you should
leave this to me and just stand back and observe.

You were completely lost when you went
up against Articuno and I, weren’t you,
Mr. “Professor in Training”?

You’re as charming as ever, even after becoming
a Neo Champion...
Well, Bede, if you’re gonna bring THAT up...

I guess that means me and Moltres should go first,
since we handily beat you and Articuno.
Urk... W-well, that’s...

Though my partner and I did lose to Hop
and Zapdos...

So, don’t ya think it’s best if
[Name:PlayerNickname ] decides who
goes first?

Hmph. I suppose we’ve no choice but to leave the
decision in [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s hands.
OK! Now that that’s out of the way...
All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Let’s have a legendary battle that Pasio will
always remember—no, one that’ll change the
course of its future!
All of us sync pairs’ll get stronger together!

We’re gonna have an absolutely
Neo Champion time!
